Long-term	conditions,	
medicines and drugs
Some medicines can harm a 
baby in pregnancy but others 
are safe.
If either you or your partner has 
a long-term illness or disability 
and has to take long-term 
medication, talk to your doctor 
about	any	possible	effects	on	
fertility or pregnancy.
Check with your doctor, 
midwife or pharmacist before 
you take any over the counter 
drugs.
Illegal	drugs	will	affect	your	
ability to
